revised_title: Senecio Alkaloids and Hepatic Cirrhosis in Cattle: A Preliminary Study
tldr: This study investigates the effects of Senecio alkaloids on cattle, specifically their link to hepatic cirrhosis. The author examines the symptoms and post-mortem findings in animals exposed to these alkaloids, concluding that they cause both acute and sub-acute poisoning, leading to liver damage and cirrhosis. The study also explores the potential role of these alkaloids in plant poisoning cases in different regions.
